name: The Knight Watch
description:
"A refreshing modern twist on the most familiar game of them all." - Pocket Gamer

"Knight Watch is puzzle game full of surprises, fun and adapted to all type of players." - Kickmygeek

"The Knight Watch‘s novel use of Chess rules and its welcoming nature manage to get it out of check" - Loud Games

Stomp your enemies with The Knight Watch, a fast paced puzzle game combining chess mechanics with arcade gameplay.
As a lone knight who can only move in L-shape (as in chess), your goal is to clear the levels by capturing all of the pieces.
Explore the 100 levels and 2 game modes and overcome units inspired by chess pieces (Rook, Bishop, Queen…) and tricky obstacles.

* Pay once and play forever! Events and monthly content are on the way...

* 30 skins to unlock; change the visuals to match your mood.

* Apple Watch friendly: adapted gameplay, 100 unique levels, daily missions and 1 specific game mode.

* Complications for Apple Watch and 15+ stickers for iMessage.

* Beautiful and stylish visuals.

* The perfect puzzle game: quick, fun and immersive gameplay!
